name: Elements (Sir Magic)
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46, this is a short game where you play as a fire mage as she attempts to free her brother.

Controls are given in the game but just as a reminder:
  • WASD to move
  • Move the mouse to aim
  • Left Mouse button to fire
  • Hit space while moving to dodge
  • Press E to interact/skip text.

Use fullscreen for the best experience, and enjoy!
